data.title: City of London, United Kingdom
data.meta_description: City of London, United Kingdom - Current temperature and weather conditions. Detailed hourly weather forecast for today - including weather conditions, temperature, pressure, humidity, precipitation, dewpoint, wind, visibility, and UV index data.
data.text:
Weather forecast and temperature for today - Friday, 16. Aug

5:48 am

8:20 pm

BST

Partly Cloudy

25°C / 12°C

Wind: 9km/h WSW

Humidity: 46%

Precip. probability: 0%

Precipitation: 0mm

UV index: 5

Today, moderately clouded weather is expected.

Temperatures are forecasted to range from a maximum of a moderately hot 25°C (77°F) to a minimum of a cool 12°C (53.6°F).

The day's highest temperature will be a couple of degrees higher than the regular August high of 22.5°C (72.5°F).

Sunrise was at 5:48 am and sunset will be at 8:20 pm; the daylight will last for 14h and 32min.

Frequently asked questions

What is the current temperature?

The current temperature (1:18 pm) is 22°C (71.6°F).

What is the weather forecast for City of London for today?

Today, partly cloudy weather is anticipated.

What will be the highest temperature today?

Today, the highest temperature will be 25°C (77°F), while the lowest temperature will be 12°C (53.6°F).

The maximum temperature will be a couple of degrees higher than the average highest temperature of 22.5°C (72.5°F) in August. The lowest temperature will be also relatively lower than the average low of 14.7°C (58.5°F).

What time are sunrise and sunset today?

On Friday, in City of London, sunrise was at 5:48 am and sunset will be at 8:20 pm (BST).

How long is the day today?

Today, the daylight will last for 14h and 32min.
